name: SubScan
description: Creator: Mahedi Hasan (Ractiurd). Unleash your inner hacker with SubScan. A tool designed for bug bounty hunters to discover subdomains across multiple sources like Subdomain Center, RapidDNS, Shodan, Certspotter, and more. Level up your recon game. Follow me on: GitHub: https://github.com/ractiurd, Twitter: https://x.com/ractiurd, Bugcrowd: https://bugcrowd.com/Ractiurd, HackerOne: https://hackerone.com/ractiurd

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; object-src 'none'; connect-src 'self' https://api.subdomain.center https://rapiddns.io https://otx.alienvault.com https://crt.sh https://api.shodan.io https://api.certspotter.com https://api.hackertarget.com https://jldc.me https://leakix.net https://corsproxy.io
